TopicTitle: Started a few weeks ago. Advice?

Articles.Content:
Hello, I just goy KSP a couple weeks ago. Watched Scott Manley's Interstellar quest, and learned basic game mechanics. I can get to the Mun no problem, but just started.

I'll be doing mission logs for my space program here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81750-Pancake-Space-Enterprises-MISSION-LOGS

Check it out if you want.

It's a little late, but welcome to the forums!

If you get stuck, feel free to check out the tutorials and other resources I've listed in the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked through my signature. Quite a few of those are oriented to new players, but there's a little something for everyone (or so I try to ensure).

Congrats on successfully and safely landing on the Mun! So what are your plans for your next planet or moon to visit?

Welcome Wabbit!

Nice start on the mission logs. I like the orange uniforms, a lot.
Thanls! I'm looking to get to Duna soon. Maybe even get to the Joolian system later.
